Blockchain simulator 1.0 documentation

Register: Main Register

«  OpenCloser: Main OpenCloser   ::   Contents   ::   Coordinator: Service Coordinator  »

Register: Main Register¶

This module run the register app

main_register.main()¶

This function allows the user to start the app Register with or without debug mode, and put the ip and port of the register app

Register: Register class¶

This module contains the class register with the functions required for validate the transactions

class register.Register¶

The class Register is the responsible of validate the transactions and the stuff related with make the confirmations

static register_transaction(wallet_from: str, wallet_to: str, amount: int)¶

This function redirect to the consume for all the required web service to validate the transaction :param wallet_from: the wallet who sends the money :type wallet_from: str :param wallet_to: the wallet who receives the money :type wallet_to: str :param amount: the amount of money :type amount: int :returns: the transaction validation :rtype: dict

Register: Service Register¶

This module contains the web service function for register

service_register.register_transaction()¶

This web services allows to process the request for validate the transactions with type method POST url: ‘http://127.0.0.1:5004/register_transaction’

service_register.run_service_register(host: str, port: int)¶

This function allows run the service register

Register: Services Register class¶

This module consume the service from the coordinator with the required data
